BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
 
 When attempting to set the artifact_refs in an experiment yaml, the CLI will accept the yaml as valid and then throw an error like this:
 <denchmark-code>Reason: ["[ErrorDetail(string=\"Persistence outputs value is not valid ['outputs-s3-temp'], it should be a string.\", code='invalid')]"]
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Add the following to an experiment yaml and try to run using the Polyaxon CLI:
 <denchmark-code>environment:
   artifact_refs: ['<volume name>']
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 Adding the artifact_refs to you yaml should allow you to set the output volume to be scheduled to your experiment pod.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 CLI 0.5.2 MacOS

comments_0.comment_text: A fix will be provided for the v0.5.4.
